public class RecipeTest
extends AndroidTestCase

Unit tests for the Recipe class.

Author:
mbabic

Constructor Summary
RecipeTest()
           
 
Method Summary
 void testConstructors()
          Test the functionality of the Recipe constructors by assuring they return Recipe objects with the expected parameters.
 void testGenerateRandomTestRecipe()
          Test the functionality of the generateRandomTestRecipe() functions by ensuring it returns a non-null Recipe object with non-null attributes and two consecutive calls to generateRandomTestRecipe() generates two recipes with different URIs.
 void testGenerateTestRecipe()
          Test the functionality of the generateTestRecipe() functions by ensuring it returns a non-null Recipe object with non-null attributes.
 void testGetTextVersion()
          Test the functionality of the getTextVersion() -- we simply ensure it can run without error and returns a non-null string for a non-null Recipe as the actual string returned varies over time.
 void testSavePhotoToDevice()
          Test the functionality of the savePhotoToDevice() method.
 void testToContentValues()
          Test the toContentValues() method by ensuring that it returns the expected ContentValues object when passed a Recipe with known parameters.

equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Method Detail

testConstructors

public void testConstructors()
Test the functionality of the Recipe constructors by assuring they return Recipe objects with the expected parameters.

testGetTextVersion

public void testGetTextVersion()
Test the functionality of the getTextVersion() -- we simply ensure it can run without error and returns a non-null string for a non-null Recipe as the actual string returned varies over time.

testGenerateTestRecipe

public void testGenerateTestRecipe()
Test the functionality of the generateTestRecipe() functions by ensuring it returns a non-null Recipe object with non-null attributes.

testGenerateRandomTestRecipe

public void testGenerateRandomTestRecipe()
Test the functionality of the generateRandomTestRecipe() functions by ensuring it returns a non-null Recipe object with non-null attributes and two consecutive calls to generateRandomTestRecipe() generates two recipes with different URIs.

testToContentValues

public void testToContentValues()
Test the toContentValues() method by ensuring that it returns the expected ContentValues object when passed a Recipe with known parameters.

testSavePhotoToDevice

public void testSavePhotoToDevice()
Test the functionality of the savePhotoToDevice() method. Ensure that the bit information of a photo object can be correctly stored to the device.
